radiographic_examinations.findings: Persistent mural thickening of a 10 cm segment of sigmoid colon with regional and adjacent diverticula in the left lower quadrant, with associated exuberant fat stranding. There is a 5 x 6 cm ill-defined confluent area of hypoattenuation consistent with a phlegmon or evolving abscess.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: This has significantly increased in size since four days ago.
